sentences.en: A notarial will is one made by a testator through a notary agency.
sentences.cn: 公证遗嘱由遗嘱人经公证机关办理.

sentences.en: A testator may revoke or alter a will he previously made.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱人可以撤销、变更自己所立的遗嘱.

sentences.en: A testator may, in an emergency situation, make a nuncupative will, which shall be witnessed by two or more witnesses.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱人在危急情况下，可以立口头遗嘱。 口头遗嘱应当有两个以上见证人在场见证。

sentences.en: A will is revoked by the subsequent marriage of the testator.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱人的再次结婚将导致(结婚前所立)遗嘱的无效.

sentences.en: A will needs the signature of the testator and two witness.
sentences.cn: 一份遗嘱需要立遗嘱人和两个证人的签字.

sentences.en: A will needs the signature of the testator and two witnesses.
sentences.cn: 一份遗嘱需要立遗嘱人和两个证人签字.

sentences.en: Article 17 A notarial will is one made by a testator through a notary agency.
sentences.cn: 第十七条公证遗嘱由遗嘱人经公证机关办理.

sentences.en: I see. But what if a testator has made several wills?
sentences.cn: 我懂了,如果遗嘱人立了数份遗瞩怎么办?

sentences.en: The executor tried to comply with the intent of the testator.
sentences.cn: 执行人尽量遵照立遗嘱之人的意图.

sentences.en: The reversion rule designates a remainder in the heirs of the grantor or testator.
sentences.cn: 复归权规则则赋予出让人或遗嘱人的继承人一项复归权.

sentences.en: These pleas presuppose execution of the will by the testator.
sentences.cn: 这些呼吁假定执行的意愿,由立遗嘱人.

words.tran_cn: 遗嘱的，据遗嘱的；遗嘱中写明的
